column1: Senate Vote #16 1789-09-21T00:00:00 - TO AMEND THE ACT (1 STAT 101
column3: TO ALLOW COMPEN- SATION TO THE JUDGES OF THE SUPREME COURT AND OTHER COURTS
column4: AND TO THE ATTORNEY GENERAL; TO INCREASE THE SALARY OF THE CHIEF JUSTICE FROM $3500 TO $4000.  (VICE PRESIDENT VOTING IN THE AFFIRMATIVE)
